titleStmt.title: The actis and constitutiounis of the realme of Scotland maid in Parliamentis haldin be the rycht excellent, hie and mychtie princeis kingis James the first, secund, thrid, feird, fyft, and in tyme of Marie now quene of Scottis, viseit, correctid, and extractit furth of the registers by the Lordis Depute be hir Maiestieis speciall commissioun thairto. Anno Do. 1566.
Acts. 1406-1566
titleStmt.author: Scotland.
Henryson, Edward.
Balfour, James, Sir, Lord Pettindreich, d. 1583.

titleStmt.title: The actis and constitutiounis of the realme of Scotland maid in Parliamentis haldin be the rycht excellent, hie and mychtie princeis kingis James the first, secund, thrid, feird, fyft, and in tyme of Marie now quene of Scottis, viseit, correctid, and extractit furth of the registers by the Lordis Depute be hir Maiestieis speciall commissioun thairto. Anno Do. 1566.
Acts. 1406-1566
titleStmt.author: Scotland.
Henryson, Edward.
Balfour, James, Sir, Lord Pettindreich, d. 1583.

publicationStmt.date: the xii. day of October the zeir of God ane thousand fyue hundreth thre scoir sax zeiris [1566]]

notesStmt.note: Some print faded and some pages stained.
Reproduction of original in the National Library of Scotland.
